main.name: Muhammad Awais
main.shortDesc: I focus on developing user-friendly web applications that meet the client's requirements, with attention to detail, scalability, and performance.

about.title: Senior Software Engineer
about.summary: Senior Software Engineer with around 4+ years of hands on experience in designing, developing, and optimizing web applications for performance and scalability. Skilled in building secure and reliable systems using modern technologies such as React, Node.js, PostgreSQL, and AWS. Adept at writing clean, maintainable, and eﬃcient code while following best practices and modern design patterns. Experienced in working within agile environments and collaborating with cross functional teams to deliver high quality software that meets business goals and enhances user experience. Passionate about solving complex technical problems, improving development workﬂows, and continuously learning new tools and technologies to drive innovation and productivity.
currentFocus: Building and improving scalable full-stack applications
Enhancing backend performance through caching, indexing, and optimized DB queries
Designing reliable REST and GraphQL APIs with microservice-ready architecture
Improving UI components for better usability, accessibility, and responsiveness
Managing cloud deployments using AWS, Vercel, Docker, and CI/CD pipelines
achievements: Delivered 10+ production-ready full-stack projects for global clients
Automated complex workflows and reduced manual work by up to 40% through custom dashboards
Improved backend API performance by up to 60% using caching and optimized queries
Led end-to-end development and deployment of multiple client products across web stacks
Deployed scalable and cost-efficient systems using AWS services like EC2, S3, RDS, and CloudWatch

desc: Gained a strong foundation in computer science principles, including algorithms, data structures, and software engineering.
Completed projects on web development, database management, and mobile app development.
Participated in tech seminars and coding competitions, improving problem-solving and teamwork skills.
Contributed to building and maintaining backend infrastructure for client projects using Node.js and Express.
Collaborated with a skilled engineering team to solve real-world challenges using modern backend technologies.
Worked on multiple backend-focused projects delivering APIs and server-side logic.
Built responsive user interfaces using React and developed backend services with Node.js and Express.
Gained practical experience in RESTful API development, database modeling, and cloud environments.
Collaborated with QA and UI/UX teams to deliver scalable and user-focused applications.
Implemented secure authentication and authorization mechanisms to protect sensitive customer data.
Integrated third-party APIs to enhance user experience and improve product stability.
Collaborated with engineering teams to estimate system loads and plan infrastructure improvements.
Designed and developed scalable backend systems using NestJS and Express.
Built RESTful and GraphQL APIs, improving performance and user engagement.
Managed AWS infrastructure and automated CI/CD pipelines, reducing deployment time and costs.
Led architecture and development of scalable full-stack applications using NestJS, GraphQL, and ReactJS.
Optimized CI/CD pipelines with Docker, GitHub Actions, and AWS to accelerate release cycles.
Built microservices using Docker, RabbitMQ, and Kafka, improving system reliability by 30%.
Mentored junior engineers and enforced best development practices, improving team output by 20%.
Collaborated across product, design, and QA teams to deliver features aligned with business goals.
